Judul: ANALYZE EFFECT OF INFLATION, SBI RATE AND CONSUMER PRICE INDICES ON STOCK RETURN OF FIVE INFRASTRUCTURE COMPANIES LISTED IN INDONESIA STOCK EXCHANGE
Abstrak: This final project will find out the effect of inflation, SBI rate and consumer price indices on stock return of five infrastructure companies listed in Indonesia Stock Exchange and this observation will use the data from year 2004 until year 2008. This final project will use the regression and Pearson Correlation method. Regression method will be applied with some classic assumption test, F-test and T-test. Pearson Correlation will be applied with correlation test between all of the variables.
Kata Kunci: Stock return,, infrastructure, inflation, SBI rate, consumer price indices, regression, Pearson Correlation
